title: Redeploy the app and prevent blank-page load failures

requirements.text: Redeploy the current application build to the Internet Computer and provide a fresh, user-accessible deployment URL that loads the app successfully in a browser.
acceptanceCriteria: A new deployment is executed successfully.
A new deployment URL is produced and shared.
Opening the new URL in a browser shows the PharmaQMS Hunter UI (not a blank page), with the header and at least the main layout rendered.

requirements.text: Add a visible non-blank initial loading fallback so that if the React bundle fails to load or takes time to initialize, the user sees an on-page message instead of an empty screen.

quotes: When im opening the app its not loading the page.

acceptanceCriteria: On first load, before React hydrates/renders, the page shows a readable loading placeholder in the root container.
If the JS bundle fails to load (e.g., blocked asset), the user still sees the placeholder rather than a completely blank page.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui or any path listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.frontend.immutablePaths.
nonGoals: Adding new product features unrelated to deployment stability.
Changing authentication providers (Internet Identity remains the only auth option).
